content: I think this small PR #6051 is now ready (though awaiting CI). However I don't want to merge it myself because I rewrote one of the lemmas entirely (to make it work over any commutative ring rather than just for fields, as originally proved).
LGTM (modulo nits)! I made a very weak effort to remove that Field assumption and gave up when I realized it would need a different proof

Thanks for looking. I fixed the naming you correctly highlighted. I almost gave up on the generalisation --- the trick was to use our linear algebra library (where happily things have been proved quite generally) as opposed to the matrix library where I discovered this is not the case.
I'm guilty of making rank_transpose not being general enough; there's a thread elsewhere that provides a slightly more general version

I'd like to have a similar lemma for surjective (rectangular) A (implying rank BA = rank B) or injective A (implying rank AB = rank B), and a lemma that implies surjectivity/injectivity based on determinant.
